properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 5 at 3:41AM PST until February 5 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches.

* WHERE...Lewiston, Lapwai, Peck, Culdesac, Gifford, and
Lewiston Grade.

* WHEN...Until noon PST today.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will change to rain for the
afternoon.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED
